attributes.action: Join campaign to to bring peace for mankind.
attributes.additional_details:
The Babri Mosque Tample project must be stopped for the betterment of the mankind. 

Thousands of people have died and this current situation will bring further destruction to the world. 

Babri Mosque was built a long time ago and we should not make the same mistakes of harming each other, as we are all brothers and sisters. Peace must be amongst the highest of priorities.

The Babri Mosque Temple must be stopped, please support this campaign to bring peace and save lives on both sides.
attributes.background:
Try our best to stop Babri Mosque Ram Tample project.
Awareness and warn danger to mankind.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the UK Government or House of Commons are responsible for.

The government of India is responsible for the building plans on this site.
